examples.fallback: Sample output in the selected format.

strict_guideline.title: Strict Guideline Example:
strict_guideline.text:
All content must strictly follow brand guidelines and use only approved messaging.
Explicitly include the brand name at least once in every response.

flexible_guideline.title: Flexible Guideline Example:
flexible_guideline.text:
Use brand guidelines as a foundation, but adapt tone and style for context and audience.
Naturally incorporate the brand name and products in a way that feels organic.

reference_only.title: Reference Only Example:
reference_only.text:
Treat the brand document as background knowledge.
Mention brand solutions only when directly relevant to the user's needs.

creative_blend.title: Creative Blend Example:
creative_blend.text:
Use brand personality traits as inspiration for creative storytelling.
Integrate brand elements naturally into the narrative.
